hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Aishah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) entered upon her and there was a close relative of hers who was in the throes of death. When the Prophet (ﷺ) saw how upset she was, he said:“Do not grieve for your relative, for that is part of his Hasanat (merits).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُؤْمِنِ يُؤْجَرُ فِي النَّزْعِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the believer being rewarded for the agony of death
